system.description:
A magical spade with an 8’ long handle and a 3’ long head. The spade has the power to excavate earth at a fantastic speed.

  • Minimum STR: Only a character of STR 18 or greater can use the spade.

  • Digging speed: The spade can excavate a cubic yard of hard clay in 2 rounds, a cubic yard of normal earth in 1 round, and a 2 cubic yards of loose soil in 1 round.

  • Resting: After 10 rounds of digging, the character must rest for 5 rounds.
